title: Ruling on using money from someone who works in a bank? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: khad from Morocco uh so my question is what's the ruling on using money that was given from somebody uh who works in a bank no problem in this you can utilize this money benefit from it enjoy it and the sin is the one who earn on the sin is on the one who earned it so his children his wife the one whom he gives gifts to they can enjoy it and he's the one who's going to be punished on the day of judgment for his Haram earning
